attributes.action: Arrange for the Release of money from the Kaupthing IOM Bank
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My entire lifes savings are frozen up in the kaupthing IOM Bank. I am a good British citizen, although born and brought up in the US.  both my children are born in Britain. this money in the kaupthing IOM Bank, from my divorce settlement, was for me to live on. I have no other income.  I am a regular middle class tax paying citizen who got caught up in this financial nightmare.  Please Prime Minister release my money, or else I will be grave hardship.

rejection.details:
There are several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/CharityHelp/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
